general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid exposure outside during the peak heat hours of the day. Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: After the monsoon rainfall prepare the land and start sowing different pulses in the field.
Choose the variety according to land type and resource available. The variety like Swarna Shreya of 115-125 days. It is drought tolerant and tolerant to disease and pest.
Change the certified seeds after three years.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Also due to weather, there may attack of Mites, to manage this spray Dicofol @ 3 ml/liter of water.
In Cucurbits, prepare poison baits for white flies by mixing 2 ml Malathion and 20 g Jaggery in 1 liter of water. And keep the baits near the plants.
Early sown rabi crops like Pulses, Oilseeds crop are at harvesting stage.
Choose the good varieties like New Kalajeera and Kalajeera, Nua Acharmati.
Choose good varieties are Kalinga Maize, Prabal, etc @ 6 kg/ac. Spacing is 60 X 30 cm. Apply the basal dose of 8:16:16 kg NPK/ac after final land preparation.
Chose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri-6, Kalinga groundnut @ 75 kg/acre of pod.
Treat the seeds with Vitavax power @ 2g/kg of seeds.
Just one hour before sowing treat with Rhizobium culture @ 20g/kg of seeds.
At final land preparation apply 2 t FYM, 1q gypsum along with 8:16:16 kg NPK/acre.
The spacing is 30 X 10 cm.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes namely Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi.
Seed rate is 6-8 q/ac.
Each piece should be 20 g and contain 2-3 eyes.
Treat the seeds before planting in the field.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga, and Rashmi.
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac.
The seed material should contain 2-3 eyes and of 20-25g per piece.
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac.
The seed material should be of 150-200 g.
Prepare the well pulverized field and make pits of 3ft X 3ft and of 1.5ft depth.
After planting the pits should be filled with equal quantity of FYM and topsoil.
